data.name: Alignment of Naggaroth
data.description: Gain a 252 unique bonus to spirit resistance.

data.name: Alter Fate
data.description: Resurrects all groupmates within 30 feet. Anyone who is brought back from the dead will also be healed for 424 over 9 seconds, and they will deal 20% more damage for 10 seconds.

data.name: Bathing In Blood
data.description: Any time you kill an enemy, you will regain 471 health over 9 seconds.

data.name: Bleed Out
data.description: Increases Lacerate, Sanguinary Extension, and Fell Sacrifice's durations by an additional 6 seconds.

data.name: Blood Offering
data.description: For the next 5 seconds, you will regain 30 Soul Essence every second. If you run out of action points or break your concentration, this effect will end.

data.name: Bloodthirst
data.description: Covenant Of Celerity will now deal X spirit damage.

data.name: Bound by Blood
data.description: Whenever you heal an ally with Khaine's Embrace, Transfer Essence, Unholy Reclamation, or Khaine's Fountain, there is a 25% chance that you will also be healed for 25% of the same amount.

data.name: Chant of Pain
data.description: You call upon the Word of Pain, dealing 300 damage every second to all enemies in a 30 feet area around you for the next 4 seconds. Reveling in their agony, you are healed for all damage inflicted by the Chant of Pain.

data.name: Cleave Soul
data.description: A potent attack which deals X physical damage to your enemy.

data.name: Consume Enchantment
data.note:
Builds 30 Soul Essence
Target must have an Enchantment
data.description: A shattering attack that removes one enchantment from your enemy and does X physical damage.

data.name: Consume Strength
data.description: A crippling attack which deals X physical damage and causes your enemy to take a (3 * rank) ability penalty to strength for 20 seconds. Your defensive target gains a (3 * rank) ability bonus to strength.

data.name: Consume Thought
data.description: An overwhelming attack which deals X physical damage to your enemy and silences them for 4 seconds, making them unable to use magic.

data.name: Covenant of Celerity
data.note: Only one Covenant may be active at a time.
data.description: All group mates within 100 feet of you gain a 20% chance to curse anyone that they damage, dealing X spirit damage and reducing the victim's run speed by 20% for 9 seconds.

data.name: Covenant of Tenacity
data.note: Only one Covenant may be active at a time.
data.description: A pact with Khaine that causes all groupmates within 100 feet to gain a X ability bonus to armor.

data.name: Covenant of Vitality
data.note: Only one Covenant may be active at a time.
data.description: Any time a groupmate within 100 feet of you damages an enemy, they have a 20% chance to deal an additional X spirit damage to their victim, and heal themselves for an equal amount.

data.name: Curse of Khaine
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy, all healing used on them for the next 5 seconds will become 50% less effective.

data.name: Dark Blessings
data.description: Direct heals cast on you will recover 10% more health.

data.name: Devour Essence
data.description: You surround yourself or an ally with a devouring aura for up to 5 seconds. Each second, your ally will deal X physical damage to up to 4 enemies within 30 feet of them, and become healed for 50% of all the damage done. This effect will end if you run out of Soul Essence to power it with.

data.name: Discipline
data.description: Gain a 160 unique bonus to willpower.

data.name: Divine Favor
data.description: A strong heal that will restore 1800 health to your target.

data.name: Divine Protection
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next 10 seconds that will absorb up to 4500 damage from melee abilities.

data.name: Efficient Patching
data.description: If Patch Wounds is used on an ally, it will additionally remove an effect from each of your groupmates. This will neither affect you nor trigger when Patch Wounds is used on yourself. Patch Wounds will remove only one effect per target.

data.name: Essence Lash
data.description: You lash out at all opponents in front of you up to 50 feet away, dealing X physical damage and regaining 15 Soul Essence for each enemy hit.

data.name: Fell Sacrifice
data.note:
Requires 40 Soul Essence per second.
This ability is not on the GCD.
data.description: When activated: deal X spirit damage every 2 seconds to enemies within 30 feet of you. During this time you deal 25% more damage. This ability will end if used again ot you run out of Soul Essence to power it with.

data.name: Fist of Khaine
data.description: You call forth the wrath of Khaine, dealing X spirit damage to your target.

data.name: Flay
data.description: You flay your target for X physical damage. If target is cursed, they are further cursed as they become snared, reducing their run speed by 40% for 6 seconds.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30% for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any silencing, disarming, rooting, snaring effects and your abilities will build 50% faster and may not be set back.

data.name: Fueled Actions
data.description: Whenever you are hit by an enemy, you have a 25% chance to gain 35 Soul Essence. Tactic can not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Gift of Khaine
data.description: Warding Strike now causes your victim to lose 50 action points.

data.name: Khaine's Blessing
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy, your autoattack speed is increased by 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Khaine's Embrace
data.description: All of your groupmates within 100 feet of you regain X health.

data.name: Khaine's Imbuement
data.description: Any time you hit an enemy, there is a 25% chance that they will suffer an additional X spirit damage over 9 seconds.

data.name: Khaine's Invigoration
data.description: A quick heal that restores X health. Not affected by cooldown modification abilities.

data.name: Khaine's Refreshment
data.description: All group mates within 100 feet of you gradually regains X health over 15 seconds.

data.name: Khaine's Withdrawal
data.description: Removes all ailments and hexes from your group.

data.name: Lacerate
data.description: A gory strike that curses your enemy, dealing X physical damage initially and another Y physical damage over 10 seconds and causing the enemy to take a (3 * rank) ability penalty to toughness.

data.name: Life's End
data.description: For 10 seconds, you allow your group mates within 100 feet (instead of yourself) to feast on the life essence of your victims, healing everyone for 50% of the melee damage you deal.

data.name: Murderous Intent
data.description: Increases your chance to critically hit by 10% and your parry strikethough by 10%, but you can no longer cast Khaine's Embrace, Patch Wounds, or Stand Coward!

data.name: Patch Wounds
data.note:
Requires 25 Soul Essence
Target must be Hexed or Ailing
data.description: You patch an ally's wound and remove one ailment or hex.

data.name: Khaine's Fountain
data.note: Requires Shield. Requires 20 Soul Essence per second
data.description:
You throw yourself open to Khaine's influence as power rushes through you for up to 3 seconds. Each second, all allies within 30 feet of you will regain X health, and you will lose 20 Soul Essence. This effect will end if you lose your concentration, or run out of Soul Essence to power it with.

You break all snares upon casting this ability and will be immune to them for the duration.

data.name: Potent Covenants
data.description: Increases the chance for your Covenants to trigger by an additional 15%.

data.name: Rend Soul
data.description:
You repeatedly assault an enemy, shredding their soul energy and twisting it to your own purposes. You strike the target up to four times over 3 seconds, dealing X spirit damage per hit. Each hit heals your defensive target for 350% of the damage that was dealt.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of Soul Essence.

data.name: Rampaging Siphon
data.description: Deals 600 damage to all enemies within 30 feet, and heals group members within 100 feet for the full amount of the damage dealt.

data.name: Restorative Burst
data.description: Any time one of your direct healing effects critically heals an ally, you will regain 40 action points over 3 seconds.

data.name: Restore Essence
data.description: Dark forces restore X health to an ally immediately, and another Y over 5 seconds.

data.name: Restored Motivation
data.description: Whenever you heal an ally, there is a 25% chance that they will regain 50 action points, but this effect will not work on you.

data.name: Sanguinary Extension
data.description: A slice aimed at fresh wounds which deals X physical damage. If the enemy was cursed, then they are further cursed and take an additional Y physical damage over 15 seconds.

data.name: Soul Infusion
data.description: Your target is gradually infused with X health over 15 seconds.

data.name: Soul Shielding
data.description: All group mates within 100 feet becomes surrounded by a magical barrier for 10 seconds, which will absorb up to X damage for each person.

data.name: Stand, Coward!
data.description: Life is restored to a dead ally, and 20% of their health is recovered in the hopes they will prove less worthless to you in the future.

data.name: Steal Life
data.description: Your target suffers 900 damage over 9 seconds, and you are healed for a half of the damage dealt.

data.name: Subtlety
data.description: All of your heals will cause enemy monsters to hate you 25% less than normal.

data.name: Terrifying Aura
data.description: Horrifying Offer can now be used without a shield. If you have a shield equipped, the cooldown is reduced by 15 seconds.

data.name: Terrifying Vision
data.description: Your enemy is distracted by malevolent spirits, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage against you for 15 seconds. You will stop attacking when you use this ability, and the effect will fade if you attack someone that you have detaunted.

data.name: Thousand and One Dark Blessings
data.description: All of your group mates within 100 feet gain a X morale bonus to armor, a Y morale bonus to resistances, and have their block/parry/dodge/disrupt increased by 25% for the next 10 seconds.

data.name: Transfer Essence
data.description: An unholy attack which deals X physical damage to your target and spills out a portion of their soul, healing any of your groupmates within 100 feet for Y health plus 50% of the damage that you dealt.

data.name: Transferred Focus
data.description: Any time you critically hit an enemy, your healing will be increased by 20% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Uncaring Dismissal
data.description: A great energy washes over all targets in front of you, blowing back all enemy players within 30 feet and knocking down monsters.

data.name: Universal Confusion
data.description: Raw power erupts in a 30 feet area around you, inflicting 1200 damage and staggering all enemies around you for 6 seconds, preventing all actions unless they're damaged.

data.name: Vision of Torment
data.note: Requires 15 points in the Path of Torture
data.description: You are overcome with seemingly endless visions of you own grisly death if you should fail. So real are the visions, that you break all snares, roots, and detaunts. For the next 10 seconds you will generate 250 and be immune to snares and roots.

data.name: Warding Strike
data.description: A cunning strike which deals X physical damage to your enemy and curses them for 15 seconds, reducing their chance to parry by 10%. You will gain 5% block for 15 seconds.

data.name: Wracking Agony
data.description: A merciless attack which deals X physical damage to the target. This ability can only be used on targets below 35% hit points.

data.name: Cheap Essence
data.description: Restore Essence now costs 30 Soul Essence.

data.name: Khaine's Vigor
data.description: Khaine invigorates all of your groupmates within 100 feet, granting them a (2 * rank) ability bonus to wounds for 1 hour.

data.name: Unholy Reclamation
data.description: Deals X physical damage and heals the caster for Y% of damage dealt.

data.name: Expanded Transfer (PH)
data.description: Transfer Essence and Unholy Reclamation can now be used on targets within 30 feet.

data.name: Khaine's Bounty
data.description:
You channel the power of Khaine through your body and into an ally healing them for X every second. You take X morale damage every second and cannot be healer for the duration.

If you have a shield equipped, you will gain 30% movement speed for the duration.

data.name: Horrifying Offer
data.description: You detaunt all enemies within 30 feet of you, making them hate you less and causing them to deal only 50% damage to you for 15 seconds. If you attack anyone that you have detaunted, the effect will immediately end.
